resources.string: Use half-width icons for general and voice search.
Use full width icons for general and voice search.
A shaded background will be used.

Touch and hold the home screen at the location you would like to place the widget in order to open the "Add to Home Screen" window.
 
Select "Widgets" from the list. This will open a list of available widgets.
 
Select the SimpleWidgets widget you would like to install.
 
The widget will appear on your home screen at your selected location.
 
To move the widget to a new location, Touch and hold the widget and drag it to its new location.

Global Search is not currently installed on this device. Please contact your device manufacturer or ROM provider for an update! Google Apps must be available on this device in order to use this widget.
Voice Search is not currently installed on this device. Please install it from Google Play Store and then set up this widget.
You must select at least one of the button options: General Search and/or Voice Search.
